supply: The generation capacities of each power plant; list of floats with length equal to the number of power plants.
demand: The energy demands of each region; list of floats with length equal to the number of regions.
cost: The transmission costs from each power plant to each region; 2D list of floats with dimensions (number of power plants, number of regions).
renewable_supply: The generation capacities of renewable sources; list of floats with length equal to the number of renewable sources.
penalty_cost: Penalty cost for unmet demand in each region; list of floats with length equal to the number of regions.
